statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID , AA.NAME , AA.SYNONYM , AA.FULL_NAME , AA.ABBR_NAME , AA.UPPR_NAME , AA.DESCRIPTION , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM jwa.Messages AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.NAME like '%' + #FindText# + '%'
AND AA.ID = #ID#
ORDER BY AA.NAME ASC
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwa.Messages ( NAME, SYNONYM, FULL_NAME, ABBR_NAME, UPPR_NAME, DESCRIPTION, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #NAME#, #SYNONYM#, #FULL_NAME#, #ABBR_NAME#, #UPPR_NAME#, #DESCRIPTION#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwa.Messages SET NAME = #NAME# , SYNONYM = #SYNONYM# , FULL_NAME = #FULL_NAME# , ABBR_NAME = #ABBR_NAME# , UPPR_NAME = #UPPR_NAME# , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
